price: Ajo që ju është premtuar, me të vërtetë do t’ju arrijë e ju nuk mund t’i ikni asaj.
arabic: إِنَّ مَا تُوعَدُونَ لَأٓتٖۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: inna mā tūʿadūna laātin wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
